entry.name: notEqual
entry.title: notEqual()

argument.name: message
argument.desc: A short description of the assertion

entry.desc: A non-strict comparison, checking for inequality.

longdesc.p: The notEqual assertion uses the simple inverted comparison operator (!=) to compare the actual and expected arguments. When they aren't equal, the assertion passes; otherwise, it fails. When it fails, both actual and expected values are displayed in the test result, in addition to a given message.
equal() can be used to test equality.
notStrictEqual() can be used to test strict inequality.
